alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Susquehanna (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Susquehanna and east central Bradford Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 830 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Herrick, or near Wyalusing, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Herrick, Le Raysville, Rushville, Herrickville, Brushville, Camptown, Stevensville, Silvara, Lawton and West Auburn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
